long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alohomora - Test Your Harry Potter Knowledge!

A simple and fun Chrome extension to quiz your Harry Potter knowledge. Answer random trivia questions about the Harry Potter world and movies. Perfect for any Potter fan looking to entertain themselves and explore the wizarding world. Install Alohomora and let the magic begin!

This is the first version, will update it soon with more questions and features!
